name: Brand Workshop Template
description:
Use this template for a quick, one-hour workshop to define a company’s brand (a.k.a it’s reputation). Starting with a team alignment exercise and moving on to a brand attributes exercise, you’ll quickly get to the heart of what people should say about the brand. Getting this alignment down early helps shape all aspects of the brand - from big feature decisions, to the look and feel of the product, to micro-copy on the website.


Credit goes to Jose Caballer and the Core Discovery Framework for the inspiration of this template. For more information about the Core Framework go to https://josecaballer.medium.com/the-core-discovery-process-79f3f116d849
